DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether acupuncture treatment ( Individualized & Standardized Acupuncture ) effective control ( sham acupuncture treatment ) also whether individualized acupuncture effective standardized acupuncture .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Individualized Standardized Acupuncture Treatment Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether individualized acupuncture effective standardized acupuncture , 276 Low Back Pain patient recruit randomly assign 4 separate group . Experimental group ( Individualized Acupuncture Group Standardized Acupuncture Group ) Control group ( Sham acupuncture wait list ) The change pain physical function compare among four group . So efficacy acupuncture , best acupuncture treatment model determine . Also addition , safety abnormal reaction acupuncture treatment evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Male female patient suffer Low Back Pain . Patients classify Class 1 ( pain lumbar area , without radiation gluteal fold absence neurologic sign ) Class 2 ( Low back pain radiation pain beyond knee , neurological sign ) accord Quebec Task Force System Suffering pain 40mm VAS ( Visual Analog Scale ) Voluntary participant complete consent . Low back trauma history within 6 month . Low back surgery history within 6 month . Low back pain cause malignancy , inflammatory disease , fibromyalgia , vertebral fracture , infection , juvenile scoliosis congenital malformation . Pain part body severe low back pain . Mental problem influence pain result questionnaire . Diseases interfere absorption , metabolism excretion medicine . History alcohol drug abuse within 12 month study . Pregnant , breastfeed childbearing age woman use birth control method .
